snippet: Lengthened to account for modern equipment and bolstered by dozens of new and vexing trees, the 15th hole at Augusta is an anomaly of analytics that helps determine the Masters champion.
abstract: Augusta National Golf Club's 15th hole, lengthened to account for modern equipment and bolstered by dozens of new and vexing trees, is an anomaly of analytics that helps determine the Masters champion; the 15th forces contenders to make tough shots and decisions.
lead_paragraph: Lengthened to account for modern equipment and bolstered by dozens of new and vexing trees, the 15th hole at Augusta is an anomaly of analytics that helps determine the Masters champion.

headline.seo: Masters Dreams Are Dashed at Augusta National’s 15th Hole
headline.main: An Easy Hole? Only for Those Who Play It Perfectly
headline.print_headline: An Easy Hole? Only for Those Who Play It Perfectly
